Texts.Chs: 干得漂亮。接下来，我建议你应该着手于制造更多的^orange;飞螳种子^reset;用于种植。因为你很快就会发现它们产出的那种特别坚韧的丝正是你所需要的材料。
Texts.Eng: Great work. Next, I suggest you start getting to work crafting ^orange;Mutavisk Seeds^reset; and start a farm. You'll want the textiles they can create fairly soon.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;奥弗塔球^reset;是一种古怪但实用的真菌。当被扔出去时，它会发出对地下探险者来说极其宝贵的光芒。快去^orange;温室^reset;里^orange;制作^reset;一些吧！
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Oonforta^reset; is a weird but useful fungus. It produces light when thrown, and will be invaluable to you. Create some in ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; and try them out!
